text.section:
If after a hearing under § 8-6B-19 of this subtitle the Board finds that there are grounds under that section to suspend or revoke a license, the Board may impose a penalty not exceeding $5,000:
Instead of suspending the license; or
In addition to suspending or revoking the license.
The Board shall adopt rules and regulations to set standards for the imposition of penalties under this section.
The Board shall pay a penalty collected under this section into the General Fund of the State.
